overview: When Kristy's (Jessica Drake) boyfriend dumps her, her silly obsession with winning him back lands her in jail. While on the inside, she makes unlikely friends with a crazy cast of characters. Her new friends teach her a new way of looking at life and when she gets out, she puts her knowledge to work. Empowered, Kristy starts an agency that offers women a chance at revenge, often with hilarious results but without the possibility of prison.
tagline: Her sentence was hard time; her revenge came easy.
title: Revenge, Inc.
